item.title: Reforged Labs launches AI ad-creation service for mobile games in open beta
item.description: Reforged Labs announced today that it's launching its AI-based ad-creation service, built specifically for mobile game studios, in open beta.

item.title: Basejump will launch social gaming platform with AI-powered game creator
item.description: Basejump unveiled its social gaming platform with an AI-powered gaming substrate dubbed Action that lets players create their own games.

item.title: AI search wars heat up: Genspark adds Claude-powered financial reports on demand
item.description: Distill Web gives users the ability to look up of 300,000-and-counting public companies and generate polished financial reports.

item.title: Snowflake Build: the 4 biggest announcements on Cortex AI and more
item.description: The company debuted new tools for Cortex AI, its fully managed offering for developing conversational AI apps.

item.title: Why AI won’t make you a better writer
item.description: Don’t let anything, least of all AI, cheat you out of what is creatively possible. Go forth and write your own story.
